meanings.definition: Anurans: a group of tailless amphibians that includes frogs and toads.
meanings.sent1: The pond was filled with anurans hopping around happily.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study anurans to learn more about amphibian species.
meanings.sent3: The anurans had a party by the lily pads, croaking and ribbiting all night long.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the anurans were like little green jewels scattered among the flowers.
meanings.sent5: Children love to chase anurans in the grass, trying to catch them with their tiny hands.
